title: Where can I find ollydbg 2.1
content: I've seen a few references to ollydbg 2.1.0.4, but the official ollydbg website only has version 2.01. Can someone point me to a download for it? Can't find it googling either...

comments.text: It may be a modded version of Olly like this. AFAIK the latest official version is 2.01 released September 27, 2013.
Also, if you look at the details of the ollydbg.exe v2.01, you will see that fileversion says 2.1.0.4.
